# The Location {.section-title}

We are excited to celebrate our wedding with you at the beautiful [Farmhouse Wandlitz](https://www.farmhousewandlitz.com/), located just outside of Berlin. Below you can find a map to help you find the venue. If you are travelling via Public transport from Berlin the Basdorf station is the closest stop, from there it is a 8 minute walk to the venue.
